label: 动物伙伴族裔 CC Animal Companion Ancestries

Ankylosaurus.name: Ankylosaurus
Ankylosaurus.description:
Your companion is an ankylosaurus or other armored dinosaur.

体型 Large

近战 1 tail, 伤害 1d8 bludgeoning

近战 1 foot, 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 25 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your ankylosaurus gores @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone} targets in your wake. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage a prone creature in your ankylosaurus's reach also deal [[/r {1d8}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d8} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent bleed Damage}. If your ankylosaurus is nimble or savage, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 2d8]]{2d8}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.H1ElYt6KovGYGzLD]{Lumbering Knockdown}

Note: This alternate version of Triceratops is provided by the module. It is granted the Triceratops support and advanced maneuvers

Ape.name: Ape
Ape.description:
Your companion is an ape or other primate.

体型 小型

近战 1 fist, 伤害 1d8 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision

速度 25 feet, climb 25 feet

支援收益 Your ape threatens your foes with menacing growls. Until the start of your next turn, if you hit and deal damage to a creature in your ape's reach, the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.0WtqP7Wei3AxHh5M]{Frightening Display}

Arboreal Sapling.name: Arboreal Sapling
Arboreal Sapling.description:
Your companion is a walking tree, a cousin of the great arboreal wardens and regents. An arboreal sapling has the plant trait instead of the animal trait, but it otherwise functions normally as an animal companion. They are typically only selected by animal order druids who are also members of the leaf order.

Access You are a member of the leaf order.

体型 小型

近战 1 branch, Damage 1d8 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision

速度 25 feet

支援收益 Your arboreal sapling plants roots around your foe, impeding its movement. Until the start of your next turn, if you hit and deal damage to a creature in your arboreal sapling's reach, the first square the creature moves into after taking that damage is difficult terrain.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.FKh7ZMNyKxgnV7kI]{Throw Rock}

Badger.name: Badger
Badger.description:
Your companion is a badger, wolverine, or other big mustelid.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 claw (agile), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 25 feet, burrow 10 feet, climb 10 feet

支援收益 Your badger digs around your foe's position, interfering with its footing. Until the start of your next turn, if you hit and deal damage to a creature your badger threatens, the target can't use a Step action (unless it can Step through difficult terrain) until it moves from its current position.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.HLD4JW6SUn5Oy8C9]{Badger Rage}

Bat.name: Bat
Bat.description:
Your companion is a particularly large bat, such as a giant bat.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

近战 1 wing (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d4 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses echolocation 20 feet (the bat can use hearing as a precise sense within this range), low-light vision

速度 15 feet, fly 30 feet

支援收益 Your bat flaps around your foes' arms and faces, getting in the way of their attacks. Until the start of your next turn, creatures in your bat's reach that you damage with Strikes take a -1 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.ODGf6brAHHKrSAPo]{Wing Thrash}

Bear.name: Bear
Bear.description:
Your companion is a black, grizzly, polar, or other type of bear.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 claw (agile), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 35 feet

支援收益 Your bear mauls your enemies when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit a creature in the bear's reach with a Strike, the creature takes [[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 slashing damage} from the bear. If your bear is nimble or savage, the slashing damage increases to [[/r 2d8]]{2d8}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.oCgdnQP5bMDD02YC]{Bear Hug}

Beetle.name: Beetle
Beetle.description:
Your animal companion is a large, flightless stag beetle.

体型 Medium or Large

近战 1 mandible, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 foot (agile), 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision

速度 35 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your beetle stomps around and smashes into foes, knocking them off balance or pushing them aside when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, while riding on your beetle, your Strikes that deal damage either make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn or move the target 5 feet away from the beetle (this is forced movement). The target chooses which effect occurs.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.zSlsnbvsGKdCTzL1]{Hustle}

Bird.name: Bird
Bird.description:
Your companion is a bird of prey, such as an eagle, hawk, or owl.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

近战 1 talon (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d4 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision

速度 10 feet, fly 60 feet

支援收益 The bird pecks at your foes' eyes when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage a creature that your bird threatens also deal [[/r {1d4}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d4} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent bleed Damage}, and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} until it removes the bleed damage. If your bird is nimble or savage, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 2d4]]{2d4}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.X4VjMfVVAjZjwcrT]{Flyby Attack}

Blood Wolf.name: Blood Wolf
Blood Wolf.description:
Your companion is a partially transformed blood wolf.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses darkvision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 40 feet

支援收益 Your wolf tears tendons with each opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage creatures your wolf threatens give the target a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (-10 on a critical success).

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.xssFjTXqGlsaddvl]{Knockdown}

Boar.name: Boar
Boar.description:
Your companion is a boar or pig.

体型 小型

近战 1 tusk, 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

速度 35 feet

支援收益 Your boar gores your foes. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage a creature in your boar's reach also deal [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent bleed Damage}. If your boar is nimble or savage, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 2d6]]{2d6}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.EwCqdvU8WOw2SSxm]{Boar Charge}

Camel.name: Camel
Camel.description:
Your companion is a camel or llama.

体型 Medium or Large

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d6 piercing

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 35 feet

特殊 mount; your camel ignores the harmful effects of mild, severe, and extreme cold or heat, selected when you gain the companion

支援收益 The camel makes a ranged attack to spit a long string of saliva at a foe within 10 feet. On a hit, the foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.PAXJgysWqv3T0tTD]{Sand Stride}

Capybara.name: Capybara
Capybara.description:
Your animal companion is a capybara, a giant rodent common in the forests of Arcadia.

体型 小型

近战 1 head (agile), 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 30 feet, swim 15 feet

支援收益 Your capybara assists you in battle. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on your next attack roll to Strike a foe within your capybara's reach. The bonus lasts until the first time you use it or until the beginning of your next turn, whichever comes first.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.cpMkN79PdNci3nGp]{Distracting Spray}

Cat.name: Cat
Cat.description:
Your companion is a big cat, such as a leopard or tiger.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

近战 1 claw (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d4 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 35 feet

特殊 Your cat deals 1d4 extra precision damage against flat-footed targets.

支援收益 Your cat throws your enemies off-balance when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that deal damage to a creature that your cat threatens make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.U0J8J5ukmqnOskE8]{Cat Pounce}

Cave Gecko.name: Cave Gecko
Cave Gecko.description:
Your companion is a sticky-footed lizard like a gecko or anole.

体型 小型

近战 a jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

速度 25 feet, climb 25 feet

支援收益 Your cave gecko helps you stay afoot, leaning into you and propping you up as you maneuver your opponent. Until the end of your next turn, as long as you are adjacent to your cave gecko, if you attempt to Disarm, Shove, or Trip an opponent and roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.q0Vh2V6KlzdMi1Pv]{Tongue Pull}

Cave Pterosaur.name: Cave Pterosaur
Cave Pterosaur.description:
Your companion is a flying prehistoric creature, such as a dimorphodon or pterodactyl, that has adapted to life in the cavern vaults beneath the ground.

体型 小型

近战 1 beak (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

近战 1 talon (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d4 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 Thievery

Senses darkvision

速度 10 feet, fly 60 feet

支援收益 Your pterosaur expands its wings and makes distracting flapping motions. Any creature that would gain lesser cover from the pterosaur gains standard cover instead.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.7C9iFWBpEOJs4Uo2]{Pterosaur Swoop}

Crocodile.name: Crocodile
Crocodile.description:
Your companion is a crocodile or a similar crocodilian reptile, such as an alligator or caiman.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 tail (agile), 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision

速度 20 feet, swim 25 feet

特殊 The crocodile can hold its breath for about 2 hours.

支援收益 Your crocodile clamps its jaws on your foe, refusing to let go. Until the start of your next turn, if your Strike damages a creature in your crocodile's reach, your crocodile can latch onto the creature. While thus attached, the crocodile can move along with the target whenever the target moves until the end of your next turn. Your crocodile can latch onto only one creature in this way, and it must release the creature to make a jaws Strike. If the target is smaller than the crocodile, it takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds and can't Fly while the crocodile is latched on.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.ttJ1CanrAuehoSV8]{Death Roll}

Dromaeosaur.name: Dromaeosaur
Dromaeosaur.description:
Your companion is a dromaeosaur (also called a raptor), such as a velociraptor or deinonychus.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 talon (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 50 feet

支援收益 Your raptor constantly darts into flanking position. Until the start of your next turn, it counts as being in its space or an empty space of your choice within 10 feet when determining whether you and your companion are flanking; you can choose a different space for each of your attacks).

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.ClUiCoBn3lHBBK5c]{Darting Attack}

Elephant.name: Elephant
Elephant.description:
Your companion is an elephant or mammoth.

体型 Large

近战 1 tusk, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 foot, 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 35 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your elephant trumpets noisily and menaces your enemy. The first creature within your elephant's reach that you hit and deal damage to before the start of your next turn has difficulty hearing as its ears ring from the noise, taking a -4 status penalty to purely auditory Perception checks until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.oYEXImMSzg0eDqzR]{Grabbing Trunk}

Fiery Leopard.name: Fiery Leopard
Fiery Leopard.description:
体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

近战 1 claw (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d4 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 35 feet

特殊 Your cat deals 1d4 extra precision damage against flat-footed targets.

支援收益 Your cat throws your enemies off-balance when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that deal damage to a creature that your cat threatens make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.U0J8J5ukmqnOskE8]{Cat Pounce}

Immunities fire Weaknesses cold 5

Flaming Attacks (fire) The fiery leopard's natural attacks deal 1 fire damage (in addition to the bonus damage dealt to flat-footed targets). This damage increases to 1d4 when the fiery leopard becomes a nimble or savage animal companion.

Fiery Pelt (fire) Creatures that start their turn grappled by the fiery leopard take 1d4 fire damage. Anyone attempting to grapple the fiery leopard takes 1d4 fire damage for each attempt.

Burning Glow The fiery leopard sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius which gives it a -2 circumstance penalty on Stealth checks made at night or in a dark environment.

Ghost.name: Ghost
Ghost.description:
Your companion is a ghost, bound to an item in your possession. Due to this bond, your ghost companion can move beyond the area of a single dwelling, but it's easier to disrupt than most incorporeal creatures. A ghost companion can be formed from a humanoid, animal, or other creature. The ghost isn't sapient and is unable to speak with the living.

体型 小型 or Medium

近战 1 ghostly touch (finesse, magical), 伤害 1d8 negative (doesn't apply the ghost's Strength modifier)

Str -5, Dex +3, Con +0, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +2

生命值 4

技能 Stealth

Senses darkvision

速度 fly 20 feet

特殊 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Features.BjE6osOFlAishRbh]{Anchored Incorporeality}

支援收益 Your ghost spooks and scares your foes as you attack them. Until the start of your next turn, if you hit and deal damage to a creature in your ghost's reach, the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.NMaMTiDB40L5O41S]{Telekinetic Assault}

Gibtas.name: Gibtas
Gibtas.description:
Your companion is a gibtas.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 claw (agile), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 35 feet

支援收益 Your gibtas mauls your enemies when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit a creature in the gibtas' reach with a Strike, the creature takes [[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 slashing damage} from the gibtas. If your gibtas is nimble or savage, the slashing damage increases to [[/r 2d8]]{2d8}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.Uv49tQCwUUjaMCj5]{Bouncing Slam}

Horse.name: Horse
Horse.description:
Your companion is a horse, pony, or similar equine.

体型 Medium or Large

近战 1 hoof (agile), 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 40 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your horse adds momentum to your charge. Until the start of your next turn, if you moved at least 10 feet on the action before your attack, add a circumstance bonus to damage to that attack equal to twice the number of damage dice. If your weapon already has the jousting weapon trait, increase the trait's damage bonus by 2 per die instead.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.tsOaXTRWQvsKTyaL]{Gallop}

Hyena.name: Hyena
Hyena.description:
Your companion is a hyena.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 40 feet

支援收益 The hyena mockingly yowls at your enemies and bites at them when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit a creature in the hyena's reach with a Strike, the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.oisXYTTYE0TABboA]{Gnaw}

Legchair.name: Legchair
Legchair.description:
Your companion is a strange creature, akin to a chair with bestial legs.

体型 Medium or Large

近战 1 hoof (agile), 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 40 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your legchair moves its limbs in the way of enemy attacks. You gain lesser cover from your legchair against all attacks, not just ones where the legchair would be in the way.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.lrchn6ROZcuKCg3C]{Careful Withdraw}

Monitor Lizard.name: Monitor Lizard
Monitor Lizard.description:
Your companion is a stocky-limbed lizard with a long, almost serpentine body.

体型 Medium

近战 a jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

速度 30 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 The monitor lizard distracts an adjacent opponent with snapping jaws and rapid movements. Until the start of your next turn, if your Strike damages a foe, any time the foe attempts an action with the manipulate trait until the end of your next turn, it must attempt a DC 5 flat check. On a failure, the action is disrupted.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.uR3j6TAJFeOVUHpY]{Lurching Rush}

Moth.name: Moth
Moth.description:
Your animal companion is a giant fruit eating moth with a strong proboscis that can pierce skin.

体型 小型

近战 1 Probiscis (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses darkvision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 15 feet, fly 30 feet

特殊 Your moth is invisible to echolocation.

支援收益 Your moth releases a shower of dust to reveal your foes. Until the start of your next turn, if you damage a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{藏匿 Hidden} creature in your moth's reach with a Strike, that creature requires only a Flat Check to target it if it's concealed, or Flat Check if it's hidden. The reduced DC lasts until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.WdTzlCO2i4loeYkQ]{Ultrasonic Scream}

Pangolin.name: Pangolin
Pangolin.description:
Your companion is a particularly large pangolin, such as an ugvashi from Vudra.

体型 Medium

近战 1 body, 伤害 1d8 bludgeoning

近战 1 claw (agile), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision

速度 25 feet

支援收益 Your pangolin tears at your enemies with its serrated plates. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage a creature in your pangolin's reach also deal [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent bleed Damage}. If your pangolin is nimble or savage, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 2d6]]{2d6}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.pMPtswKNokDNyYR2]{Defensive Curl}

Rhinoceros.name: Rhinoceros
Rhinoceros.description:
Your companion is a rhinoceros or woolly rhinoceros.

体型 Large

近战 1 horn, 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 30 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your rhino swings its heavy head to unbalance your enemy. The first creature within your rhino's reach that you hit and deal damage to before the start of your next turn becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.JMHoCFb886K6dT1n]{Rhinoceros Charge}

Riding Drake.name: Riding Drake
Riding Drake.description:
Your companion is a swift, flightless drake with limited intelligence, less vicious than most drakes but fiercely loyal to you. A riding drake has the dragon trait instead of the animal trait, but it otherwise functions normally as an animal companion.

体型 Large

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 tail, 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +2, Dex +1, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +2

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses darkvision

速度 45 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your drake snorts fire in your foes' faces. Until the start of your next turn, each time you Strike while riding the drake and hit a creature in the drake's reach, the creature takes [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4 fire damage} from the drake. If your drake is nimble or savage, the fire damage increases to [[/r 2d4]]{2d4}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.8JdETVTpbZAgtBA3]{Breath Weapon}

Scorpion.name: Scorpion
Scorpion.description:
Your companion is one of the various species of giant scorpion.

体型 小型

近战 1 stinger, 伤害 1d6 piercing plus poison (see Special)

近战 1 pincer (agile), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +3, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses darkvision

速度 30 feet

特殊 The scorpion's stinger attack deals an additional [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 poison damage} or [[/r {2d4}[poison]]]{2d4 poison damage} if the scorpion is a specialized companion.

支援收益 Your scorpion drips poison from its stinger when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage a creature in your scorpion's reach also deal [[/r {1d6}[persistent,poison]]]{1d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent poison Damage}. If your scorpion is nimble or savage, the persistent poison damage increases to [[/r 2d6]]{2d6}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.7H8wqKtsAaSgyLyp]{Grab and Sting}

Shadow Hound.name: Shadow Hound
Shadow Hound.description:
Access You're a shadowcaster.

Your companion is a canine creature related to the Shadow Plane denizens known as shadow mastiffs.

Size Small

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +1

生命值 4

Skill Intimidation

Senses darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

Speed 30 feet

支援收益 Your shadow hound shrouds your foes in shadow when you leave an opening. Until the start of your next turn, when you damage a creature with a Strike and that creature is within reach of your shadow hound, both you and your shadow hound become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} to the creature until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.EvuMVR9ut9wIHOtq]{Bay}

Shark.name: Shark
Shark.description:
Your companion is a shark of any kind, such as a hammerhead, great white, or jigsaw shark.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses blood scent, scent (imprecise, 60 feet)

速度 swim 40 feet

特殊 The shark has the aquatic trait. Its blood scent enables it to smell blood in the water from up to 1 mile away.

支援收益 When your shark senses blood, it tears into your enemies. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit a creature in the shark's reach with a Strike and deal slashing or piercing damage, the creature takes [[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 slashing damage} from the shark. If your shark is nimble or savage, the slashing damage increases to [[/r 2d8]]{2d8}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.F98ajoIakyOPEuwj]{Shred}

Skeletal Bird of Prey.name: Skeletal Bird of Prey
Skeletal Bird of Prey.description:
Your companion is the skeleton of a bird of prey like a falcon or an owl.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d6 piercing

近战 1 talon (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d4 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -5, Wis +0, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 none (mindless)

Senses darkvision

速度 10 feet, fly 50 feet

特殊 mindless

支援收益 The bird flaps around and throws your foe off balance. Until the start of your next turn, when you damage a creature in the bird's reach with a Strike, that creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.ow3S5zhS51Nj8tsI]{Unnerving Screech}

Skeletal Constrictor.name: Skeletal Constrictor
Skeletal Constrictor.description:
Your companion is the skeleton of a constrictor snake such as a boa or python. Red lights burn deep in its eye sockets.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +1, Int -5, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 none (mindless)

Senses darkvision

速度 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

特殊 mindless

支援收益 Your snake sways, captivating an enemy. Choose one creature within 20 feet of the constrictor that can see it. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that deal damage to the chosen creature make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.AH3kNbdGLYaRjVAr]{Bony Constriction}

Skeletal Mount.name: Skeletal Mount
Skeletal Mount.description:
Your companion is a skeletal horse, drake, elk, or other animal suitable for riding. Skeletal mounts can be collapsed, gathered into piles of bone, and packed away for storage.

体型 Large

近战 1 hoof (agile), 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -5, Wis +0, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 none (mindless)

Senses darkvision

速度 35 feet

特殊 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Features.CSBy1IgHTSkVAFMM]{Mindless Companion}, mount

支援收益 Your skeletal mount strikes fear when it charges. Until the start of your next turn, if you are riding your skeletal mount and move at least 10 feet on the action before your attack, any creature damaged by the attack becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2} if the attack was a critical hit. This is an emotion, fear, and mental effect.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.tsOaXTRWQvsKTyaL]{Gallop}

Skeletal Servant.name: Skeletal Servant
Skeletal Servant.description:
Your companion is a humanoid skeleton, mindless but capable of assisting in rudimentary chores. Like the skeletal mount, it can be collapsed for easy storage.

体型 小型 or Medium

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 claw (agile), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +1, Int -5, Wis +0, Cha +1

生命值 4

技能 none (mindless)

Senses darkvision

速度 20 feet

特殊 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Features.CSBy1IgHTSkVAFMM]{Mindless Companion}

支援收益 Your skeletal servant jabs bones into your enemies to distract them while you attack. Until the start of your next turn, when a Strike you make hits and deals damage to a creature within your skeletal servant's reach, that target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.6LvtdtVVwtbzqUXG]{Screaming Skull}

Snake.name: Snake
Snake.description:
Your companion is a constrictor snake, such as a boa or python.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +3, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 Stealth

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

支援收益 Your snake holds your enemies with its coils, interfering with reactions. Until the start of your next turn, any creature your snake threatens can't use reactions triggered by your actions unless its level is higher than yours.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.kKW68gi1FNJlNSOp]{Constrict}

Terror Bird.name: Terror Bird
Terror Bird.description:
Your companion is a terror bird, a large species of flightless carnivorous avian.

体型 Large

近战 1 beak, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 talon (agile), 伤害 1d6 piercing

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision

速度 40 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your terror bird screeches at your enemies when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that deal damage to a creature within your terror bird's reach make the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.TCEQtO5DawzVAIyT]{Tearing Clutch}

Triceratops.name: Triceratops
Triceratops.description:
Your companion is a triceratops or other armored dinosaur. If necessary, change the horn attack and damage type to an appropriate attack for the dinosaur (for example, an ankylosaurus would have a tail attack that deals bludgeoning damage).

体型 Large

近战 1 horn, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 foot, 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 25 feet

特殊 mount

支援收益 Your triceratops gores @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone} targets in your wake. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage a prone creature in your triceratops's reach also deal [[/r {1d8}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d8} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent bleed Damage}. If your triceratops is nimble or savage, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 2d8]]{2d8}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.H1ElYt6KovGYGzLD]{Lumbering Knockdown}

Tyrannosaurus.name: Tyrannosaurus
Tyrannosaurus.description:
Your companion is a tyrannosaurus, allosaurus, or similar large, carnivorous dinosaur.

体型 Large

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 foot, 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 Intimidation

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 35 feet

支援收益 Your tyrannosaurus roars and puts on a fearsome display as you attack, startling your foes. Until the start of your next turn, if you hit and deal damage to a creature within your tyrannosaurus's reach, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.yXw82Zd5nkcCUfRQ]{Overwhelm}

Ulgrem-Lurann.name: Ulgrem-Lurann
Ulgrem-Lurann.description:
Your companion is one of the few surviving members of a formerly lost species, hatched from the last clutch of Ulgrem-Axaan. As it's so young, its intelligence hasn't developed yet, but some day, it will become a highly intelligent creature. An Ulgrem-Lurann has the beast trait instead of the animal trait but otherwise functions normally as an animal companion.

体型 Medium

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

近战 1 tail, 伤害 1d6 bludgeoning

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis 0, Cha +1

生命值 6

技能 Intimidation

Senses darkvision

速度 20 feet, swim 25 feet

特殊 The Ulgrem-Lurann has the amphibious trait.

支援收益 The Ulgrem-Lurann grabs at your foe and zaps it. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit a creature in the Ulgrem-Lurann's reach with a Strike, the creature takes an additional [[/r {1d4}[piercing]]]{1d4 piercing damage} and [[/r {1d4}[electricity]]]{1d4 electricity damage} from the Ulgrem-Lurann. If the Ulgrem-Lurann is nimble or savage, the piercing damage and electricity damage each increase to [[/r 2d4]]{2d4}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.Upr7u0KhPAIMOqXv]{Snatch and Zap}

Undead Hand.name: Undead Hand
Undead Hand.description:
Your companion is a large skeletal or fleshy humanoid hand, similar to a giant crawling hand (Pathfinder Bestiary 2 56).

体型 小型

近战 1 claw (agile, finesse), 伤害 1d6 slashing

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +1, Int -5, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 none (mindless)

Senses darkvision

速度 20 feet, climb 20 feet

特殊 mindless

支援收益 The hand viciously batters the foes you attack. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit a creature in the hand's reach with a Strike, the creature takes [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} from the hand. If your hand is nimble or savage, the bludgeoning damage increases to [[/r 2d6]]{2d6}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.MQv67R7KBIrJkshN]{Grip Throat}

Vampiric Animal.name: Vampiric Animal
Vampiric Animal.description:
Your companion is a wolf, weasel, fox, or other predator with fangs and the blood thirst of a vampire. They often serve vampires who willingly shared their blood to bind the animal to their vampiric whims.

体型 小型 or Medium

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 4

技能 生存

Senses low‑light vision, scent (imprecise 30 feet)

速度 30 feet

特殊 Vampiric animal companions are particularly attuned to the scent of blood. If a creature has persistent bleed damage, your vampiric animal companion can smell the creature if it's within 120 feet rather than 30 feet.

支援收益 When your vampiric animal senses blood it tears into your enemies. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage a creature in your vampiric animal's reach also deal [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent bleed Damage}. If your vampiric animal is nimble or savage, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 2d6]]{2d6}.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.cVrW2GGLVpydj8h5]{Blood Feast}

Vulture.name: Vulture
Vulture.description:
Your companion is a vulture, condor, or other large scavenging bird.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +2, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 10 feet, fly 45 feet

特殊 Your vulture gains a +1 status bonus to all saves against disease, and if it rolls a success on a save against a disease, the result is a critical success instead.

支援收益 The vulture retches and vomits onto a foe within 10 feet. Until the start of your next turn, if you hit and deal damage to the target, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). The DC of the Fortitude save is 12 (or 14, if the vulture is a specialized animal companion) + your level + the vulture's Constitution modifier.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.g4JEtCnKXyY4LJpm]{Feast on the Fallen}

Water Wraith.name: 水缚灵 Water Wraith
Water Wraith.description:
你的同伴是一只水缚灵，一种两栖的、形态可变的蜥蜴，能够随心所欲地改变其鳞片的颜色。虽然你的同伴还没有成熟到它的全部力量和智慧，但它仍然以令人钦佩的顽强和忠诚为你服务，更不用说它那张像鳗鱼一样的撕裂性牙齿的嘴和八只有尖锐利齿、凶猛的脚。

体型 小型

技能 生存

Str +3, Dex +2, Con +2, Int –4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

速度 20 尺, 游泳25尺

近战 1 啃咬, 伤害 1d8穿刺

近战 1 爪抓(灵巧), 伤害 1d6挥砍

特殊 水缚灵可以屏息大约2个小时。

支援收益 你的水缚灵发出嘶嘶声，在环境复杂的交锋中迅速改变颜色，在一片阴影和色泽的瞬息间中压倒你的敌人。直到你的下一个回合开始，每次你击中水缚灵触及范围内的生物，该生物会被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。

进阶战技 饮血 Gulp Blood

Wolf.name: Wolf
Wolf.description:
Your companion is a wolf or other canine creature, such as a dog.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws (finesse), 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -4, Wis +1, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 生存

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

速度 40 feet

支援收益 Your wolf tears tendons with each opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that damage creatures your wolf threatens give the target a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (-10 on a critical success).

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.xssFjTXqGlsaddvl]{Knockdown}

Zombie.name: Zombie
Zombie.description:
Your companion is a mindless zombie created from a soulless dead body, be it animal or humanoid. The stats below list a fist Strike, but this can be replaced by a claw or similar option better suited to the creature's form.

体型 小型 or Medium

近战 1 fist, 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +0, Con +4, Int -5, Wis +0, Cha +0

生命值 10

技能 none (mindless)

Senses darkvision

速度 20 feet

特殊 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Features.CSBy1IgHTSkVAFMM]{Mindless Companion}

支援收益 The zombie emits an aura of rot, causing wounds to fester. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit a creature that's within 10 feet of the zombie and you deal damage, the creature takes an additional 1d6 damage as the wound festers. If your zombie is nimble or savage, the damage increases to [[/r 2d6]]{2d6}. This is a disease and necromancy effect.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.LaBfTYUsvoI3nscv]{Take a Taste}

Zombie Carrion Bird.name: Zombie Carrion Bird
Zombie Carrion Bird.description:
Your companion is the zombified corpse of a large scavenging bird, such as a vulture or a raven, that subsists upon meat.

体型 小型

近战 1 jaws, 伤害 1d8 piercing

Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -5, Wis +0, Cha +0

生命值 6

技能 none (mindless)

Senses darkvision

速度 10 feet, fly 30 feet

特殊 mindless

支援收益 The zombie emits an aura of rot, causing wounds to fester. Until the start of your next turn, each time you hit and deal damage to a creature that's within 10 feet of the zombie carrion bird, the creature takes an additional 1d6 damage as the wound festers. If your carrion bird is nimble or savage, the damage increases to [[/r 2d6]]{2d6}. This is a disease and necromancy effect.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.9o7NwxGqohpa9M7r]{Pick at the Meat}

Zombie Mount.name: Zombie Mount
Zombie Mount.description:
Your companion is the rotting, reanimated corpse of a horse, camel, or similar riding animal.

体型 Large

近战 1 hoof, 伤害 1d8 bludgeoning

Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -5, Wis +0, Cha +0

生命值 8

技能 none (see Special)

Senses darkvision

速度 30 feet

特殊 mindless, mount

支援收益 Your zombie mount chews on your enemies. Until the start of your next turn, each time you Strike while riding the zombie mount and hit a creature in the zombie mount's reach, the creature takes [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4 bludgeoning damage} from the zombie mount. If your zombie mount is nimble or savage, the bludgeoning damage increases to [[/r 2d4]]{2d4}. This benefit is based on a zombie horse or camel, but might deal piercing damage if your mount has sharp teeth.

进阶战技 @Compendium[pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.h1Rldre8WVjUR5XO]{Disgusting Gallop}
